security_measures: Emergency alarms and communication units on platforms and inside trains
Specialized tunnel ventilation and safety systems
operations: Operations Control Center monitors train movements and infrastructure
Intensive pre-launch testing, including stress-tests for heat and sand

passenger_guidelines.noise_policy: Passengers are expected to maintain a low noise level; no dedicated quiet carriages.
passenger_guidelines.platform_guidance: Clear signage and staff assist passengers to the correct section.
passenger_guidelines.security: Security personnel and metro staff patrol stations and trains to maintain order.

overview: Riyadh Metro integrates modern technology, passenger comfort, and cultural considerations. It connects key landmarks, integrates with buses and park-and-ride facilities, and offers a fast, safe, and convenient way to navigate Riyadh.

description: Single men are expected to use this section exclusively
Single men cannot enter Family section unless accompanying female relatives
For families with children, including husbands, brothers, fathers, and male relatives
Women traveling alone or with family
Single men unrelated to these women and families are NOT allowed
Women can choose this section for comfort
Premium experience with wider leather seats
Requires First Class ticket or pass
Access restricted to ticket holders only

features: Physical separation via glass partitions between sections
Platform signs indicate boarding locations for each class
Clear labels and frosted glass partitions inside trains
cultural_context: The arrangement respects local customs, similar to other Gulf metro systems. Solo male travelers must use Singles; women and families can use Family section. First Class offers premium service.

station_design: Tactile guidance paths for visually impaired
Curb cuts and easy drop-off zones
train_features: Priority seating for elderly, pregnant women, and disabled riders
Wheelchair assistance at some main stations
facilities: Braille signage on some station signs and ticket machines
service_animals: Service animals may be allowed, but travelers should confirm with customer service due to rarity in KSA.
overview: The metro is user-friendly for travelers with mobility challenges, with minimal barriers from street to train.

description: Stepping outside the station (or using the connected walkways), you are in the heart of the King Abdullah Financial District – a modern development filled with offices, residences, and lifestyle destinations.

features.details: At least one high-end shopping mall and various boutiques featuring luxury brands.
Designed as part of the district's lifestyle amenities.

summary: KAFD is essentially a 'city within a city' known for its futuristic architecture and comprehensive services, offering amenities for meetings, dining, shopping, and leisure activities.
